pros: This is a demo version of the new Grandis Library
Stay tuned for a full Beta release of this site
Most pages have been disabled and only serve to showcase the site and the new class
cons: Additionally, if you want a better experience of API skill loading
I have also included 3 class demos at the bottom of the page
You'll notice a 'Check out some more Nova classes below:' text
The container is actually a swipable element!
It supports both mobile and desktop use

linkSkill.name: Prior Preparation
linkSkill.shortDesc: Defeating 8 enemies, or attacking a boss monster 17 times will add a stack of 'Pre-Prep'. After gaining 5 'Pre-Prep' stacks, gain a 17% Damage buff for 20 sec\nCooldown: 40 sec

For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

extraContent.title: Possession and Execution Skills
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, you gain access to your special resource gauge, Possession that utilizes Malice. Malice is gained periodically and from attacking enemies with Breath Shooter skills like Strike Arrow. Every 100 Malice, you gain a Malice Stone that is used to enter Possession state. In Possession state, enhances one attack granting it special effects. Possession skills share the same Skill Key and Skill Points (SP) as their regular version. Possession skills also have their own independent cooldowns from the regular skill

  • Up to 2 Malice Stones can be held at a time, it is increased to 4 in 4th Job
  • 8 Malice is generated periodically in 2nd Job, it is increased to 10 in 4th Job
  • 12 Malice is generated when landing a Breath Shooter skill, it is increased to 17 in 4th Job

Below is all skills that have a Possession form:

  • / Strike Arrow (1st Job)
  • / Scattering Shot (2nd Job)
  • / Shaft Break (3rd Job)
  • / Falling Dust (4th Job)
  • / Sneaky Sniping (Hyper Skill)
  • Dragon Burst (5th Job) - Always usable

Additionally, in 3rd Job, you gain a passive called Death Blessing. Possession skills add stacks of Death Blessing which new Execution skills will detonate for a devastating additional attack. As well, when you defeat an enemy with a most Execution skills, the cooldown of Shadow Step (1st Job), a dash skill that provides great mobility

Below is all your Execution skills:

  • Phantom Blade (3rd Job)
  • Tearing Knife (3rd Job)
  • Chain Sickle (4th Job)
  • Poison Needle (4th Job)
  • Sneaky Sniping (Hyper Skill)
  • Fatal Blitz Loop (5th Job)

Lastly, lots of your skills have a charge system where you have a set amount of charges which need to recharge. Below is a list of all charge system skills:

  • Scattering Shot (2nd Job) - 3 Charges, 6 sec recharge
  • Shaft Break (3rd Job) - 3 Charges, 8 sec recharge
  • Falling Dust (4th Job) - 2 Charges, 10 sec recharge

primary.name: Strike Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 70%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 4\n[Arrow Fragment]: Attack up to 2 enemies not hit by Strike Arrow with 55% damage 5 time(s)
primary.desc: Fires several arrows forward
details: When an attack hits, fragments are created that seek out enemies that were not hit by the arrows
Occasionally when used, a Possession enhanced form may appear

primary.name: Shadow Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 10 sec\n[Passive Effect]: Movement Speed: +10
primary.desc: Quickly dashes in a given direction
details: Can be used to dash in all four directions using the Arrow Keys
Can be used while casting certain skills

When dashing left or right, you enter a Dark Sight state
  • Using the skill again will cancel the effect
[Passive]: Increases Movement Speed

primary.name: Grappling Wire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Fires a special wire onto terrain which can be used to move to towards the wire\n[Passive Effect]: Jump: +10
primary.desc: On tap, fires a grapple that can attach to terrain
details: After a wire is attached, re-using the skill by holding down the Skill Key will move you towards the grapple

Pressing the Skill Key and an Arrow Key toegether will direct the wire
  • This results in either a straight shot or 45 degrees upwards/downwards depending on direction
Can be used in the air

primary.name: Shadow Swift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 10, Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Hitman
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +40, Critical Rate: +35%, Knockback Resistance: +50%, Max HP: +15%, DEF: +200, Damage Taken: -15%

primary.name: Covert
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability: +25%, Movement Speed: +20, Max Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Possession
primary.shortDesc: Generates 8 Malice at a certain time, Breath Shooter skills generate 12 Malice when hit, 100 Malice are required to obtain 1 Malice Stone, up to 2 Malice Stones can be held at a time.\nConsume a Malice Stone to enter Possession for 15 sec\nCooldown: 0.3 sec
primary.desc: A special resource called Malice that generates passively and whenever you attack an enemy
details:
Each time 100 Malice is generated, you gain a Malice Stone (max. 2 in 2nd Job)
  • Consuming a Malice Stone will cause you to enter Possession state which causes your next attack to be in enhanced Possession form

primary.name: Dragon Fang
primary.shortDesc:
For each Dragon Fang, Duration: 40 sec, Damage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 4, returns after attacking up to 7 times after attack mode is activated
Damage against normal monsters: +20%
 Dragon Fang(s) enter attack mode when Kain attacks an enemy.
Can command up to 3 Dragon Fang(s)
Attack mode activation cooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, periodically as you attack, you summon Dragon Fangs that attack nearby enemies whenever you attack
details: Up to 3 can be active at a time
Deals increased %Damage to normal monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Strike Arrow II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 4\n[Passive Effect]: Increases Strike Arrow's damage by 89% p, Arrow Fragment's damage by 60% p
primary.desc: After using , fire another barrage arrows forward
details: Shares a Key Slot with and can only be used after it
Also creates Arrow Fragments
Additionally, permanently increases %p Damage of (including Arrow Fragments)

primary.name: [Possession] Strike Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nCooldown: 1 sec
details: Possession version of attacks are only usable in Possession state
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as and the same Key Slot as

primary.name: Scattering Shot
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, Consumes 1 Scattering Shot Charge
 Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 4, Number of Arrows Fired: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 2
If an enemy is hit by multiple arrows, each arrow after the 1st arrow deals 50% reduced Final Damage
Damage against normal monsters: +30%
You gain 1 Scattering Shot Charge every 6 sec, and can store up to a maximum of 3
primary.desc: Fires a spray of arrows forward
details:
Uses a special resource called Scattering Shot Charge
  • You gain one Scattering Shot Charge every 6 secs (up to 3 at a time)
If an enemy is hit by more than one arrow, each additional arrow deals reduced %Final Damage
Deals increased %Damage to normal monsters
[Note]: Animation is only a recreation, in-game, multiple arrows are fired in a cone

primary.name: [Possession] Scattering Shot
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, Damage: 135%, Number of Attacks: 4, Number of Arrows Fired: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 1
If an enemy is hit by multiple arrows, each arrow after the 1st arrow deals 50% reduced Final Damage
Damage against normal monsters: +30%
Cooldown: 7 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Arrows now home and seek out enemies with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Note]: Animation is only a recreation, in-game, multiple arrows are fired in a cone

primary.name: Breath Shooter Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Increases attack speed of Breath Shooter for 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Breath Shooter Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Breath Shooter Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +30

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: STR +60

primary.name: Strike Arrow III
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: After using , fire another barrage arrows forward
details: Shares a Key Slot with and can only be used after
Also creates Arrow Fragments
Additionally, permanently increases %p Damage of (including Arrow Fragments), , and

primary.name: Death Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Using Possession skills will inflict enemies with a Death Blessing debuff, which lasts for 60 sec and can be stacked up to 10 times\nExecution skills consume the debuff and will attack the enemy 10 time(s) for 150% damage per stack and increases the %Final Damage of Death Blessing for 5 sec
primary.desc: Possession attacks apply a stacking debuff (up to 10) onto enemies that Execution attacks can consume to damage an enemy
details:
[Debuff]: Execution skills consume the debuff and damages the enemy
  • Additionally grants a buff that increases the %Final Damage of Death Blessing briefly
When the debuff is consumed, the cooldown of is reset
Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

primary.name: Shaft Break
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 67, Consumes 1 Shaft Break Charge
 Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 3
When created, draws up to 7 enemies and then explodes. Explosion deals 140% damage to 10 enemies 10 times.
You gain 1 Shaft Break Charge every 8 sec, and can store up to a maximum of 3
primary.desc: Fires an arrow forward that pulls in enemies before exploding
details:
Uses a special resource called Shaft Break Charge
  • You gain one Shaft Break Charge every 8 secs (up to 3 at a time)
Arrow starts pulling in enemies once it hits an enemy or reaches max distance
Explosion is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Possession] Shaft Break
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 67, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 3
When created, draws up to 7 enemies and then explodes. Explosion deals 240% damage to 10 enemies 10 times.
After the explosion, cyclone is created
[Cyclone]: Damage: 40%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Duration: 3 sec
Cooldown: 12 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as

Now additionally leaves a lingering cyclone briefly after exploding
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: [Execution] Phantom Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Slashes forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed

primary.name: [Execution] Tearing Knife
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 4\nCooldown: 4.5 sec
primary.desc: Stabs forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Tearing Knife, the cooldown of is reset

primary.name: Remain Incense
primary.shortDesc:
When a Possession skill, Thanatos Descent, or Falling Dust hits an enemy, create 5 crystals for 10 sec
Up to 10 crystals can be active
When activated, deal 4 time(s) 150% damage to an enemy per crystal
If an enemy is hit by multiple crystals, each crystal after the 1st arrow deals 50% reduced Final Damage
Damage against normal monsters: +50%
Cooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: When toggled, when a Possession skil or Thanatos Descent (5th Job), Grip of Agony (5th Job) hits an enemy, crystals are created that will seek out and damage nearby enemies
details: Crystals activate whenever Kain attacks near a crystal

primary.name: Natural Born Instinct
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +25%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Chance: +20%, DEF: +10%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Grinding
primary.shortDesc:
Max MP: +20%, DEF: +20%
Scattering Shot Damage: +75% p
[Possession] Scattering Shot Damage: +80% p
Dragon Fang Damage: +50% p

primary.name: Possession II
primary.shortDesc: Generates 10 Malice at a certain time, Breath Shooter skills generate 17 Malice when hit, and obtain up to 4 Malice Stones
details: Increases Malice gain rate
Can now carry up to 4 Malice Stones

primary.name: Advanced Death Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Death Blessing activation damage: +155% p, Death Blessing Final Damage increase: +5% p\nRestore 5% of Max HP when you defeat 5 enemies\nWhen Death Blessing activates on a boss monster, recover 3% Max HP

primary.name: Falling Dust
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95, Consumes 1 Falling Dust Charge\n Damage: 410%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 12\nYou gain 1 Falling Dust Charge every 10 sec, and can store up to a maximum of 2
primary.desc: Leap into the air and fire arrows down at an angle
details:
Uses a special resource called Falling Dust Charge
  • You gain one Falling Dust Charge every 10 secs (up to 2 at a time)
When used in the air, you will not leap up

primary.name: [Possession] Falling Dust
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95, Damage: 420%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 12\n[Malice]: Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 15\nCooldown: 16 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
Now creates a lingering dragon attack where the arrows landed

primary.name: [Execution] Chain Sickle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 95, [First Hit] Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 5\n[2nd Hit] Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 5\nCooldown: 7 sec
primary.desc: Swings a chain sickle forward and then slams it into the ground
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Chain Sickle, the cooldown of is reset

primary.name: [Execution] Poison Needle
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 105, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nWhile held, consecutively attack up to 6 enemies for 12 time(s) 115% damage while applying a DoT that deals 290% damage for 12 sec\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: When held, slashes around yourself before surrounding yourself in poisonous needles that apply a damaging poison debuff to enemies hit
details: When used in the air, you will float
Unaffected by Attack Speed increases
If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Poison Needle, the cooldown of is reset

primary.name: Dragon Scale
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 4% of Max HP per sec. Can be held for 3.4 sec.\nCooldown: 35 sec\n[Passive Effect]: Additional Avoidability Chance: +30%
primary.desc: When held, become invincible briefly
details: While active, you can move around
Unaffected by cooldown resets
[Passive]: Grants an additional chance to dodge attacks

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Grinding II
primary.shortDesc:
Attack Power: +30
Strike Arrow, Strike Arrow II, Strike Arrow III, and Arrow Fragment Damage: +85% p
[Possession] Strike Arrow Damage: +85% p
Scattering Shot Damage: +75% p
[Possession] Scattering Shot Damage: +80% p
Dragon Fang Damage: +40% p
Shaft Break Arrow and Explosion Damage: +60% p
[Possession] Shaft Break Arrow, Explosion Damage: +75% p, Cyclone Damage: +20% p
[Execution] Phantom Blade Damage: +100% p
[Execution] Tearing Knife Damage: +80% p
Remain Incense Damage: +100% p

primary.name: Dogma
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +20%, Critical Damage: +20%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Breath Shooter Expert
primary.shortDesc: Breath Shooter Mastery: +70%, Final Damage: +30%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Adapt to Death
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%, Boss Damage: +10%, Max HP: +20%, Damage Taken: -15%

hyperPassive.name: Breath Shooter - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Breath Shooter skills

hyperPassive.name: Breath Shooter - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Breath Shooter skills

hyperPassive.name: Breath Shooter - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of Breath Shooter skills

hyperPassive.name: Execution - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of Execution skills

hyperPassive.name: Execution - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of Execution skills

hyperPassive.name: Execution - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: During the final damage increase effect, you cannot be knocked back while using an Execution skill

hyperPassive.name: Dragon Scale - Extra Healing
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recover 7% of Max HP per second during key down

hyperActive.name: Chasing Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Track up to 6 enemies and shoot 3 arrows with 320% damage 6 time(s)\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Focuses several enemies and fires a precise shot

hyperActive.name: Sneaky Sniping
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 10, Shockwaves: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 12\nHold down skill key to charge (up to 1.4 sec max)\nCooldown: 45 sec
hyperActive.desc: While held, charges to unleash a barrage of shockwaves forward
details: Holding the Skill Key will extend the range of the shockwave up to a max distance
Unaffected by Attack Speed increases

hyperActive.name: [Possession/Execution] Sneaky Sniping
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 12, Shockwaves: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 12\nHold down skill key to charge (up to 1.6 sec max)\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as
If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Sneaky Sniper, the cooldown of is reset

hyperActive.name: Incarnation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +15%, Attack Power: +15%, Knockback Resistance: +50%
Death Blessing Number of Attacks increased to 13
When party members attack near Kain, a Death Blessing aura is triggered that deals 150% damage 6 time(s). Cooldown: 3 sec
Cooldown: 180 sec
details: While active, increases the number of hits per attack of

While active, party members can trigger an aura attack while attacking near Kain
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: [Possession] Dragon Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Max Key Down Duration: 3 sec, Damage: 950%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 12, up to 10 attacks can be triggered\nYou can change directions while casting. Cooldown: 0.5 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: When held, unleashes a blast of arrows forward
details: You can change directions while casting
You do not need to be in Possession state to use and will not consume Possession state to use

fifthMain.name: [Execution] Fatal Blitz Loop
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Max Key Down Duration: 3 sec, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 8, up to 10 attacks can be triggered\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a violent barrage of slashes forward
details: If the attack hits an enemy with debuff, the debuff is consumed
If the enemy is defeated with Fatal Blitz Loop, the cooldown of is reset

fifthMain.name: Thanatos Descent
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 35, Damage: +40%, Knockback Resistance: +50%, 20 Malice generated at a certain time, Breath Shooter skills generate 25 Malice when hit, Remain Incense cooldown is reduced to 1.5 sec
[Touch of Death] Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12, Cooldown: 3 sec
When the skill ends or is re-used, become invincible and attack up to 15 enemies 15 time(s) for 1300% damage
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage, %Knockback Resistance, and increases Malice gain rate
details: Periodically, whenever you attack, you create an additional attack

At the end of the skill or when the Skill Key is pressed again, unleash a final attack
  • You are invincible during this time

fifthMain.name: Grip of Agony
fifthMain.shortDesc: Passive Effect: Defeating 25 enemies or attacking boss monsters 12 times will harvest 1 Agony (up to 15 max)\nActive Effect: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 6 sec, Requires at least 1 Agony. Consumes all Agony to summon a Hand of Suffering that deals 450% damage 4 time(s), up to 12 enemies. For every Agony, duration increases for 1 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a zone of agony at your position that damages enemies within it
details:
This skill has a special resource called Agony which are gained from defeating enemies and attacking boss monsters and you can hold up to 15 Agony
  • Using Grip of Agony consumes all Agony to increase the duration of the attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Kain is an upcoming class coming to Korean MapleStory during the NEO Winter Update
